Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.listeners.ConcreteMessageListenerSubscriber
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisconnectListener, DisconnectListenerSubscriber, MessageListener, MessageListenerSubscriber, MessageHandler, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ControllerTest.ModelListener
public class VirtualClient extends ConcreteMessageListenerSubscriber implements MessageListener, MessageHandler, DisconnectListener, DisconnectListenerSubscriber
Class for handle connection between a specified player and the server. Virtual Client forward valid request to the controller
